list.name: Changes
list.comment:
In this Update:
Likes & comment count number into csv
Need To work On: Expanding view for comments and likes when the count is big implement likes system on videos feed
Previous Updates: Refactoring Like button works for liking and unliking posts for PictureFeed.js Passing postID to comments & Likes BTN Objects Feed page implemented new DB for postData Implemented global styles sheet for feed Done - Need to implement GUi on videosFeed GUI looks how it needs to for PictureFeed.js Done - Configuring viewable BTN & TXT based on image background as its hard to see white Like txt on a white background. Like BTN Basics implemented Renamed variables from profilePicture to profileImage to match DB USernames added to userstories Usernames are also shortened if they are too long Username added to stories in feed Font size typo error in <Username_Link_Txt>
